meta.title: From EGG to TOSS
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: In an egg toss, teams of two attempt to throw a egg to each other from longer and longer distances without breaking their shells. As players drop their eggs and are eliminated, the ground becomes littered with splattered yolk and cracked eggshells. My friend Cory and I actually won the neighborhood egg toss this year, beating out a slate of grizzled egg-tossing vets.

Move the last letter of <> to front to get a hose function

Change one letter in <> to get a lob
